name: 데어데블 / Daredevil
description:
Hello. I made a game called Daredevil, first time uploading on itch.io.

-----------

Creator: GreeneryTea

Game Title: 데어데블(Daredevil)

Genre: (弱)Horror, Action, Casual

Please install the font first and then play the game.

Daredevil aims to play with high utilization of keys. After you run the game and press F1, make sure that the key (shown in red) entered in the photo file "Guide" in the folder is the same as player's(your) setting. You can easily complete the setup by pressing Reset Defaults button.

The story of the game is just a creator's idea, a creation. There is no connection with a real people/religion/event, etc.

Playtime is expected to be 30 minutes to 1 hour for all the endings based on the first play.

The game contains horror illustrations & bloody descriptions

There are two endings. (End1 with Soft/Standard difficulty, End2 with Sinister difficulty level)

I will not separate the Korean/English versions, instead you can select language in-game.

If you find any bugs (or suspected bugs) during the play, please let me know in the comments right away.
